alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 28 at 8:22PM CDT until May 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 458 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet. * WHEN...From noon to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
